scripts.build: pnpm --filter endpoint-file-server run build && pnpm --filter vite-plugin-dev-endpoint run build
scripts.version: pnpm --filter endpoint-file-server run version && pnpm --filter vite-plugin-dev-endpoint run version
scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter endpoint-file-server run test && pnpm --filter vite-plugin-dev-endpoint run test
